creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: riverfront scene; river in foreground; traditional style buildings built up against the river; man in boat at LR; group of people crossing bridge in center, blossoming cherry tree in foreground at L and top
marks: Left: {Jizuri}, {Shōwa 8 nen saku}, Japanese title LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Hayase
